SERVICE_0.NAME: Native language AI conversation translation
SERVICE_0.DESC: Uploading audio and video for translation into other languages, with AI engines processing quickly and conveniently
SERVICE_0.FEATURE_1: Audio-visual recognition supports AI translation and transcription into multiple languages.
SERVICE_0.FEATURE_2: Audio-visual subtitle translation simultaneously generates AI-generated timestamp markers.

SERVICE_1.NAME: AI automatically transcribes records of meeting conversations
SERVICE_1.SLOGAN: Submitting meeting records is super convenient
SERVICE_1.DESC: Multi-person conversation speech recognition, automatically transcribed into text; can also generate meeting record summaries, significantly reducing time costs
SERVICE_1.FEATURE_1: Multi-person conversation speaker recognition rate exceeds 90%.
SERVICE_1.FEATURE_2: Meeting conversation semantic speech recognition rate exceeds 90%.
SERVICE_1.FEATURE_3: The user interface is simple and intuitive, with meeting records downloaded upon completion.
SERVICE_1.FEATURE_4: Summary of meeting conversation records can be generated if needed.

SERVICE_2.NAME: AI video subtitle generation
SERVICE_2.SLOGAN: No more staying up late for video proofreading
SERVICE_2.DESC: Through the AIspeakin semantic speech recognition engine, accurate subtitles and time stamps are generated, with an accuracy rate of up to 90%, eliminating the need for tedious typing and proofreading

SERVICE_3.NAME: AI text-to-speech
SERVICE_3.DESC: AIspeakin's personified speech generation supports multiple languages and offers different voices to choose from. Diverse lifelike voice reading services for quickly producing podcasts and audiobooks
